text: @ScottMorrisonMP This is my kids' gymnastics club, which has continued to provide online classes during the COVID-19 shutdown, but may face long-term trouble and is struggling due to the rigidity of Jobkeeper. Can you help? https://t.co/ERPAGyhoro
